TopicTitle: BDarmory MK-22 Pod HUD is opaque instead of clear

Articles.Content:
So I have all the dependencies installed (Raster prop monitor, ASET props, ASET props aviation, etc.) for the BDarmory Mk-22's IVA. All the buttons work fine except the HUD is opaque instead of clear.

Here's what it looks like: 

https://i.imgur.com/DUEFsPb.png

Whats wrong here and how do I fix it?

Here are the logs: https://www.dropbox.com/s/gmnskpfcib6s0b8/Player.log?dl=0
